name: Mitsubishi Hitachi Power Systems Europe GmbH
goal:
MHPSE, a subsidiary of globally operating MHPS Ltd., has over 100 years experience in designing and constructing power plants. Today it is also devising new energy storage technologies.
Innovation, reliability and sustainability are its core drivers.
Including subsidiaries, the company counts approx. 1,450 highly skilled staff.
More information under www.eu.mhps.com.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Energy Union;
- Horizon 2020;
- Project financing mechanisms;
- Single energy market;
- Climate and Energy policy framework;
- BREFs under the IED;
- Air quality policy;
- Decarbonisation of the Transport Sector & Alternative Fuels.
